divs: Sighting Details1. In my car driving from Kansas to Iowa. 2. Was hovering. 3. Airplane. 4. Looked like an airplane because of red blinking lights but suddenly stopped and hovered and red lights turned off and it came back from the way it was going. Kept moving slowly at this point until I could no longer see it because of the trees. Once the red lights went away, a green light appeared on one point of the triangular object, the rest of the lights were yellow-clear. Also had very small lights on the bottom of the object that sort of outlined the triangular shape. 5. At first I was very excited and happy that I was looking at this object. This was my second up close UFO encounter so I was anxious to pull over and take a picture but I couldn't get a good enough shot. Awhile after the sighting I started feeling nervous and my hands were shaking. I eventually calmed down. 6. Went behind trees.
Summary: large, triangular, green and clear lights
trends: There has been one other sighting in Pleasant Hill
There were no other sightings in Pleasant Hill on or around October 17th 2011
